overview: For nearly two years, Anna Polina has shown the whole world her tremendous talents as a performer in about thirty films. Here's your chance to relive the hottest moments of her career through over 20 ultra-hardcore scenes! With a great deal of deep throat, anal sex and double penetrations going on, she fully intends to show that she's not all that innocent!
tagline: Relive the most intense and visually stimulating scenes starring Anna Polina, the Dorcel Girl of a thousand vices!
title: Anna Polina Infinity
